I look forward to my visits

I have been going to Jo, saw for my neck issues. I look forward to my visits. From day one Jo put me at ease as I was quite nervous, and I always walk out feeling so much better- Jo is very knowledgeable about all health issues, regularly giving me advice. such a lovely man

SaraL-33

I found results after the first session

After spending hundreds on physiotherapy that only seemed to last several days, I was introduced to Jo Sunner and although sceptical I found results after the first session. I can’t recommend Bourne Osteopath Clinic enough!

David S

Jo has been excellent

I had a severe back problem for a number of years, which resulted in two major surgeries. Throughout this Jo has been excellent. Professional, kind, supportive and honest about what he can and cannot help with. He also treats my daughter who lives in London and this has been possible because Jo has been extremely flexible about appointment times. I would recommend Jo to anyone.

I can not recommend this practice highly enough

I have been to see Jo at the Pulse Practice a number of times and every time I am greeted with a smile and friendly service. Even when I have gone in with issues I have been reassured that my issue will be resolved and not once in all the times I have had to visit the practice has this been proven wrong.
If you have any reason to visit a physiotherapist then I can not recommend this practice highly enough.

Jo is an extremely knowledgeable professional

I have seen Jo many times over the years, he is an extremely knowledgeable professional who really cares about helping people. I have had hip pain, lower back and neck pain plus some torn ligaments, each time he has been able to help me, however he is very honest and will only book appointments if he feels he can genuinely help. Can’t recommend highly enough.

I would never go to anyone else

I have been going to Jo for over 12 years with different issues. He is incredibly professional and honest as the whether he can help, he always makes you feel completely at ease and relaxed. I would never go to anyone else and would recommend him to anyone and have done over the years.

CW-166, patient

Highly recommend!

I had an emergency! I couldn’t turn my head, I had major pain in my neck and upper back and around my right shoulder. Came on instantly one morning at work and got progressively worse very quickly. Turns out I had a trapped nerve in my back. Mr Sunner sorted it within 2 visits. Was so pleased. I needed just one day off work and actually didn’t realise the extent of my issue as since my visit I have had so much more flexibility and movement than before my reason for visiting. Highly recommend!

RoryA-6, patient

The treatment has literally changed my life

Been seeing Jo for a number of years but more recently for a severe back injury I sustained last year. He has been fantastic with any advice I have needed, the treatment has literally changed my life and Jo’s flexibility booking appointments around my work and home commitments has been second to none. Would highly recommend to anyone.
